document.full_text: harvey dorfman was hired by the oakland athletics in the mid-1980s as their mental performance coach, and worked his magic with some of the game's biggest stars.
document.title: an appraisal: for dorfman, 100 percent of the game was mental
lines_and_colors: harvey dorfman was hired by the oakland athletics in the mid-1980s as their mental performance coach, and worked his magic with some of the game's biggest stars.
